style_variant_notes.friendly: Warm rounded aesthetic, light backgrounds, colorful accents (style-friendly.css). Pages: home-1, home-2, home-3, *-frl.html
style_variant_notes.stylish: Dark/bold aesthetic, angular shapes, high contrast (style-stylish.css). Pages: home-4, home-5, home-6, *-stl.html

sections.style: Full-width with large display typography, floating decorative shapes, parallax hero image at bottom, rotating SVG circle-text scroll indicator
Split layout: left small heading + deco text, right two paragraphs with accent color spans
3-column icon boxes with SVG icons, centered text, staggered animations
Left column: vertical service list with expandable items + CTA arrows. Right column: 3 large counter numbers stacked vertically
Half container: left colored box with large display text, right full-bleed image with parallax zoom + overlay. Below: text + border button row
unique_features: Colored gradient background on text side
Parallax image zoom on image side

sections.style: 4-column full-width team cards with hover overlay showing name, social icons, role. Image zoom on hover
unique_features: Full hover overlay with team info

sections.style: Large centered text with accent-highlighted keywords + decorative shapes. Below: two horizontal scrolling marquee tapes (one with buttons, one with headings) moving in opposite directions
unique_features: Rubber text hover effect on main heading

sections.style: Swiper slider with blog cards: image + category badge + date badge + title + excerpt + arrow CTA
unique_features: Category and date badge overlay on image

sections.style: Reversed half container: left colored box with subscribe form (email input + arrow button), right side with embedded video background (mp4)
unique_features: Email subscribe form with inline button

sections.style: Large 'Let's TALK' link with rubber hover, horizontal menu bar, social icons, copyright bar
Split layout: left side with stacked display headlines + social icons + SVG circle scroll indicator, right side with full-height parallax image (1.45x zoom)
Left text column with heading + paragraphs + counter stat (257+), right column with tall image + floating button box overlay
unique_features: Counter stat integrated in about section
Floating CTA button overlapping image frame

sections.style: 2-column masonry grid: alternating portrait/square/landscape aspect ratios. Each card has hover overlay with project name + arrow CTA. Below: text + view-all CTA row
unique_features: True masonry layout with mixed aspect ratios (port/square/land)

sections.style: Left side: heading + description + CEO quote with portrait + CTA button. Right side: 2x2 offset grid of team cards with hover overlays
unique_features: Asymmetric offset grid (2nd column shifted down)
Combined description + quote + team cards layout

sections.style: Centered Swiper slider: portrait circle image + name + company + testimonial text. Pagination dots + prev/next arrows. Scale parallax animation on slide transition
4-column partner/brand logo row with hover animation
unique_features: Clean logo grid with consistent sizing

sections.style: Full-width colored background with floating decorative shapes (parallax), centered large display text + description. Below: get-in-touch button row with line separators
Split layout: left display text with personal name, right side with multi-layer parallax scene (3 PNG layers with mouse-tracking depth effect via Parallax.js). Social icons overlaid on scene
unique_features: Mouse-tracking parallax scene with 3 depth layers
Overlay with social icons on scene

sections.style: Centered narrow column: circle portrait + greeting heading + large descriptive text + handwritten signature image
3-column hoverable icon boxes with decorative shape icons, each clickable as full card link
Reversed half container with left text box (heading + description) and right side with multi-layer parallax scene (3 PNG depth layers). Below: text + get-in-touch CTA
4-column bordered partner logos (type-2 variant)
Full-screen dark hero with animated shape background (Parallax.js depth layers), overlay, centered display text with award icon + SVG circle scroll indicator
unique_features: Dark animated background with parallax shape

sections.style: Full-width service list with horizontal separator lines, each item has title + description + arrow CTA button
3-column stylish counters with large numbers and accent-colored plus signs
unique_features: Stylish variant counters with different styling

sections.style: Stylish half container: dark-toned text box with display text, right side image with parallax + overlay. Below: CTA button row
4-column stylish team cards with dark hover overlay, accent-colored role text
Full-screen background image hero with dark overlay, centered display text with award badge, SVG circle scroll indicator at bottom
Left text with heading + paragraphs + CEO portrait quote block. Right: tall image with floating button box
Split hero: left with greeting icon + name + role + download CV button, right with large portrait image + SVG circle scroll text. Below: horizontal scrolling marquee tape with services
unique_features: Personal portfolio hero with CV download
Portrait image with circle text overlay

sections.style: Split: left heading 'Story About Me' + deco text, right two paragraphs. Clean minimal layout
Small hero with breadcrumb navigation + large display heading + decorative shapes
3-column large service cards with heading + description + bullet list of sub-services + arrow CTA. 5 services in 3-col grid
unique_features: Detailed service cards with bullet sub-lists
Large card format with generous spacing

sections.style: Stylish small hero with dark theme, breadcrumb + display heading
3-column contact info boxes: phone icon + call info, message icon + email addresses, map icon + physical address
Half container: left side with heading + 2-column form (name, email, textarea, submit button), right side with embedded Google Maps iframe + overlay
3-column grid of 6+ team cards, each with hover overlay showing name + social icons + role
Swiper slider of blog cards with custom prev/next navigation. Each card: cover image + category/date badges + title + excerpt + arrow CTA
3-column full-width masonry grid with mixed aspect ratios (portrait/square/landscape). Hover overlay with title + CTA
2-column portfolio grid with consistent card sizing and hover overlays
Full-width list/stacked portfolio layout with large images

recommended_for_conversion.reason: Split hero with full-height parallax image is a unique layout not commonly found. Converts well to a portfolio/agency hero component.
Full-screen background image hero with overlay - clean, versatile, works for many business categories.
Personal portfolio hero with portrait + CV download + marquee tape. Unique personal branding hero style.
Combined services list + counter stats in split layout. Novel section combining two data types.
Detailed service cards with bullet sub-lists. Great for SaaS/business templates needing detailed service breakdowns.
Split half-container CTA with colored background text + parallax image. Highly reusable layout pattern.
Dual-direction horizontal marquee tapes with rubber text. Very trendy modern web effect. UNIQUE - not in existing components.
Team section with CEO quote + asymmetric offset grid. Unique layout combining testimonial + team in one section.
Clean testimonials slider with parallax-scale transitions. Well-designed testimonial component.
Personal about with circle portrait + signature image. Unique for portfolio/personal brand templates.
Masonry grid with mixed aspect ratios and hover overlays. Professional portfolio/gallery component.
Split contact form + Google Maps layout. Clean practical contact section.
Newsletter CTA with video background. Modern pattern combining subscription form with visual media.
Full-width colored CTA with floating parallax shapes. Eye-catching call-to-action block.
Clean stylish counter stats. Simple but effective stats component for dark themes.
Clean footer with giant rubber-hover contact link. Minimalist but impactful.

conversion_notes.gsap_compatibility: Template uses GSAP ScrollTrigger and ScrollSmoother extensively. Site Builder already has gsap-universal.js (v3.0) which covers most effects. Key mappings: mil-up -> fade-up, mil-scale-img -> scale-in, mil-rubber -> text-split, mil-rotate -> uses custom SVG rotation
conversion_notes.css_migration: Two CSS files (~3000+ lines each) contain all component styles. Need to extract relevant CSS per component and inline it or create scoped styles. Key CSS classes: mil-display1-4 (typography scale), mil-a1/mil-a2 (accent colors), mil-m1-m4 (color modifiers), mil-head1-6 (heading sizes)
conversion_notes.swiper_dependency: Blog slider and reviews slider use Swiper.js. Could be replaced with CSS-only solutions or converted to simpler scroll patterns for Site Builder compatibility.
conversion_notes.parallax_js_dependency: home-3 and home-6 use Parallax.js (mouse-tracking depth layers). This is complex and may need to be simplified to CSS transforms or GSAP-based parallax for Site Builder.
conversion_notes.font_awesome: Template uses FontAwesome for icons (fal = light, far = regular). Need to either include FA subset or convert to inline SVG icons.
conversion_notes.bootstrap_grid: Uses Bootstrap grid (container, row, col-*). Site Builder components should use the same grid system or convert to CSS Grid/Flexbox.

sections_adding_most_variety: pixy-cta-marquee-tapes - Horizontal scrolling tape/marquee effect NOT in current 166 components
pixy-hero-6 - Personal portfolio hero with CV download NOT in current hero variants
pixy-team-split-quote - Combined team+quote layout NOT in current team variants
pixy-services-list-counters - Combined services+stats layout NOT in current service variants
pixy-portfolio-masonry - True masonry grid with mixed aspect ratios NOT in current gallery variants
pixy-about-personal - Personal about with signature NOT in current about variants
pixy-subscribe-half-video - Video background newsletter NOT in current CTA variants
